scenario_text.value:
Ah, hello, Takuma. I fear we’ve come up short
in our perusal of the area.

Enemies are sure to show up around here. Will
you be all right?

Indeed, with such a stalwart companion, you
need not fear for my safety.

Still, such a modern facility hardly piques
my archaeological curiosity...

At least there’s no risk of you getting lost
in your inquisitive thoughts here.

Don’t worry about Akiharu, Takuma. You can go
check another spot.
